Media content rating systems are systems for evaluating the content and reporting the suitability of television programs and movies for children, teenagers, or adults. Many countries have their own rating system and countries' rating processes vary by local priorities. Programs are rated by the organization that manages the system, the broadcaster, or the content producers.

== Comparison table ==
A comparison of current media content rating systems, showing age on the horizontal axis. Note however that the specific criteria used in assigning a classification can vary widely from one country to another. Thus a color code or age range cannot be directly compared from one country to another.

* <span style="background:red; border:solid black 1px; color:white;">&nbsp;'''Red'''&nbsp;</span> – ''Restricted: Parental accompaniment required for younger audiences''.
* <span style="background:black; border:solid black 1px; color: white;">&nbsp;'''Black'''&nbsp;</span> – ''Prohibitive: Exclusively for older audience / Restricted to a specific audience / Purchase age-restricted'' / Banned.

== Usage ==
=== Ryuuganime ===
:''Main article: [[Content rating guidelines]]''
The rating system used by Ryuuganime is an artificial rating that refers to Indonesia and the United States rating system with some classifications taken from South Korea rating rules.

In the current system there are six rating categories:
*[[G0+|<span style="background:white; border:solid black 1px; color: black;">&nbsp;'''G0+'''&nbsp;</span>]]: ''General — Suitable for all ages''
*[[PS2+|<span style="background:yellow; border:solid black 1px; color: black;">&nbsp;'''PS2+'''&nbsp;</span>]]: ''Preschool - Suitable for 2 years old up to 6''
*[[PG7+|<span style="background:yellow; border:solid black 1px; color: black;">&nbsp;'''PG7+'''&nbsp;</span>]]: ''Parental Guidance — Suitable for 7 years old up to 12''
*:Parental guidance is suggested for designated age range.
*[[PG13+|<span style="background:red; border:solid black 1px; color: white;">&nbsp;'''PG13+'''&nbsp;</span>]]: ''Parental Guidance — for 13 years old up to 17.''
*:Parental accompaniment required for younger audiences
*[[R18+|<span style="background:black; border:solid black 1px; color: white;">&nbsp;'''R18+'''&nbsp;</span>]]: ''Restricted — restricted for audience below 18 years old up to 20.''
*[[GU21+|<span style="background:black; border:solid black 1px; color: white;">&nbsp;'''R18+'''&nbsp;</span>]]: ''Grown-Up — restricted for audience below 21 years old or older.''
